Reference

CFB Data

Data from CFB API

Data Accquisition (Inject with our EP/WP models)

cfb_conf_types_df

College Football Conference

cfb_game_info()

Get information from games

cfb_pbp_data()

Extract CFB (D1) Play by Play Data - For both plays and drives

cfb_play_stats_player()

Gets player info associated by play

cfb_play_type_df

College Football Mapping for Play Types

cfb_rankings()

Gets Historical CFB poll rankings at a specific week

cfb_recruiting()

Gets CFB recruiting information for a specific year (and possibly a specific team)

cfb_sp_ranking()

Get S&P+ historical rating data

cfb_srs_ranking()

Get SRS historical rating data

cfb_team()

Lists all teams in conference or all FBS Current support only for D1

cfb_team_roster_data()

Get a teams full roster

cfb_team_talent()

Get composite team talent rankings for all teams in a given year or all rankings from 2015 - 2018

Plot

Plot Functions

plot_pbp_sequencing()

Plot the Drive/PBP Sequencing

plot_wpa()

Plot the WPA for a specific game
